name: Required Message validation test for multiple fields
description: The test sets a value with the wrong data type in several fields for different widgets. After approval, it checks the text under the field, which informs about the correctness of the type of data entered
descriptionHtml: The test sets a value with the wrong data type in several fields for different widgets. After approval, it checks the text under the field, which informs about the correctness of the type of data entered

steps.name: Launching the browser...
Authorization via KeyCloak with login: demo and password
Entering a username: demo
Entering a password
Clicking on the Login button

testStage.description: The test sets a value with the wrong data type in several fields for different widgets. After approval, it checks the text under the field, which informs about the correctness of the type of data entered

steps.name: Selecting the Datetime validation field level dynamic section in the left menu.
Selecting a tab Form on a page
Validation FormWidget by heading (Title) Form title
Validation of a field with the DateTime by heading Custom Field
Validation of a field with the DateTime by heading Custom Field Additional
Setting the 1999-04-07T17:35 in the field
Getting a value from a field
Clearing the field through the cross icon
Focus on the field
Setting the 1999-04-07T17:35 in calendar
Setting the 1999-04-07T17:35 in the field
Getting a value from a field
Clearing the field through the cross icon
Focus on the field
Setting the 1999-04-07T17:35 in calendar
Click on the button save

Closing the browser window
